abstract: In a move intended to show that he was tough on immigration, Gov. Rick Perry said that with approval of the Mexican government, he would consider sending troops into Mexico to help defeat drug cartels and improve border security.
snippet: In a move intended to show that he was tough on immigration, Gov. Rick Perry said that with approval of the Mexican government, he would consider sending troops into Mexico to help defeat drug cartels and improve border security.

headline.main: Perry Open to Military Intervention in Mexico's Drug War
